description: [IMAPLoader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1152) hides the Windows Console window created by its execution by directly importing the `kernel32.dll` and `user32.dll` libraries `GetConsoleWindow` and `ShowWindow` APIs.(Citation: PWC Yellow Liderc 2023)

external_references.description: PwC Threat Intelligence. (2023, October 25). Yellow Liderc ships its scripts and delivers IMAPLoader malware. Retrieved August 14, 2024.
